summary: Frontend onboarding copy was updated to state that username "Jay" will be Manager and all others Assistants. The backend change for enforcing/correcting roles during profile creation cannot be verified from the provided truncated backend diff, and there are additional unrequested feature descriptions added to a frontend summaries file.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update backend user profile creation/registration logic so that username/user ID "Jay" is always assigned the Manager role (and corrected if already exists) and every other newly created user profile defaults to Assistant.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend diff shown is truncated and does not include any user registration/profile creation logic or any code that assigns/corrects roles based on username "Jay"; therefore the requirement cannot be confirmed as implemented from the provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/mentioned a new "wipeStorage" mutation that clears cached data after execution.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2 and appears only as an added description in the modified summaries file.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/mentioned a Manager Dashboard "Settings" tab containing a "DangerZone" component for system-wide dangerous operations.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2 and appears only as an added description in the modified summaries file.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad UI/feature changes described across many frontend components (theme/palette overhaul, overtime UI, analytics, charts, task date utilities, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: These are not part of the BuildRequest and are introduced as additional feature descriptions in the modified summaries file, without being asked for.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state tracking updates (new_feature_requests entries AR-1/AR-2/AR-3 marked pending).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of REQ-1/REQ-2; appears as additional project tracking data rather than requested functionality.
